keyword: how many calories in titos vodka
title: How Many Calories in Tito's Vodka?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Tito's vodka per standard shot, including full nutrition breakdown, serving tips, and low-cal mixer ideas for your drinks.
h1: How Many Calories in Tito's Vodka?
assumptions: Tito's Handmade Vodka, 80 proof (40% ABV), standard 1.5 fl oz (44 ml) shot, served neat; no mixers or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by proof, serving size, and any added mixers; alcohol content affects calorie count. Consult product labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 1.5 oz shot of Tito's Vodka contains about 97 calories, all from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Mix with 4 oz soda water (zero calories)
Add 1 oz simple syrup for a cocktail
Use diet tonic water instead of regular

faqs.q: How many calories in one shot of Tito's vodka?
faqs.a: Approximately 97 calories in a 1.5 oz shot.

faqs.q: Does Tito's vodka have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: No carbs, sugars, or other macros—just 97 kcal from alcohol per shot.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 ml of Tito's vodka?
faqs.a: About 231 calories per 100 ml, based on 40% ABV.

faqs.q: Is Tito's vodka low-calorie compared to other spirits?
faqs.a: Yes, similar to most 80-proof vodkas at 97 kcal per shot; lower-proof options have fewer calories.

faqs.q: What mixers keep Tito's vodka calories low?
faqs.a: Opt for soda water, diet tonic, or fresh lime—avoid sugary juices or sodas to stay under 100 kcal per drink.
